summary: Squad of beautiful government agents tries to catch saboteurs.
cast: Michael Ansara|Francine York|Anthony Eisley|John Carter|Lisa Todd|Rafael Campos|Lillian Garrett|William Bagdad|Herb Robins|Curt Matson|Christopher Augustine|Bertil Unger|Gustaf Unger|Richard Reed|William Bonano|Dru Landers|Sherri Vernon|Jean London|Carol Terry|Judith McConnell|Leigh Christian|Tura Satana|Brett Zeller|The Penny Brothers Show|Steve Nave|Ted V. title: The Doll Squad
